Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; zigzag pattern in added white near top of sherd; near bottom of sherd two white bands; exterior: narrow and wide brown bands.
Curator's comments: The sherd joins British Museum 1888,0601.468.e. Given the limited amount of decoration on the sherd's interior, perhaps this sherd ought to be placed in the early phases of the Mature Animal Style.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1527) (phase 2)
